name: Dungeon Explorer (itch) (Indie Alley)
description:
How far can you go? 

Battle enemies on each level of this dungeon, and proceed to the next one, where enemies will be even tougher.

Before moving to the next level, you can escape the dungeon, restore your health and increase your stats!

Special Thanks to xdeviruchi for the music pack and to HeartBeast for the text font.
